description: Bootstrap v3.2.0 Popover plugin implementation extending tooltip.js, defining Popover class, its methods, and jQuery plugin interface.

classes.name: Popover
classes.description: Class implementing popover functionality, extending tooltip.js, with methods for content management, rendering, and jQuery plugin integration.

methods.name: getDefaults
methods.description: Returns default options for the Popover.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the popover, including title and body, and manages visibility.

methods.name: hasContent
methods.description: Checks if the popover has content to display.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Retrieves the content for the popover, either from data attribute or callback.

methods.name: arrow
methods.description: Returns the arrow element of the popover.

methods.name: tip
methods.description: Returns the popover element, creating it if necessary.
